lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator

Interface AbstractCoinAcceptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoinRackSimulator, CoinReceptacleSimulator, DeliveryChuteSimulator

    public interface AbstractCoinAcceptor
    A simple interface to allow a device to communicate with another device that accepts coins.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptCoin(Coin coin)
      Instructs the device to take the coin as input.
      boolean hasSpace()
      Checks whether the device has enough space to expect one more item.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptCoin

        void acceptCoin(Coin coin)
                throws CapacityExceededException,
                       DisabledException
        Instructs the device to take the coin as input.
        Parameters:
        coin - The coin to be taken as input.
        Throws:
        CapacityExceededException - If the device does not have enough space for the coin.
        DisabledException

      • hasSpace

        boolean hasSpace()
        Checks whether the device has enough space to expect one more item. If this method returns true, an immediate call to acceptCoin should not throw CapacityExceededException, unless an asynchronous addition has occurred in the meantime.
        Returns:
        true if there is space, false if there is not space
